name: Irish Bioenergy Association
goal: Promote the use of bioenergy in Ireland including, wood fuel, biodiesel, bioethanol, biogas and biomethane
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives: Renewable Energy, Environment, Green House Gas Reduction, Circular Economy, Life Cycle Analysis, Rural Affairs, EU goals and targets in Renewable Energy, RED
